I think Overwatch 2 is great, the development team just needs to work on monetisation, content, server stability, server regions, matchmaking, toxicity in the community, game mechanics, responsiveness, transparency, and project planning.
aunque el juego es bueno le gana su versiÃ³n porno
awful game just play tf2 or paladins

[h1] This place is not a place of honor... no highly esteemed deed is commemorated here... [b]nothing valued is here.[/b] [/h1]

[list]
[*]What is here was dangerous and repulsive to us. This message is a warning about danger.

[*]The danger is in a particular location... it increases towards a center... the center of danger is here... of a particular size and shape, and below us.

[*]The danger is still present, in your time, as it was in ours.

[*]The danger is to the body, and it can kill.

[*]The form of the danger is an emanation of energy.

[*]The danger is unleashed only if you substantially disturb this place physically. This place is best shunned and left uninhabited."
ì™„ì „ ì—‰ë§ì´ì˜ˆìš”. ì§„ì§œ ì—‰ë§ì´ì˜ˆìš”. ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ì“°ë ˆê¸° ê°™ì€ ê²Œì„ì„ í•´ë³¸ ì ì´ ì—†ì–´ìš”

You play the game since 2016, bought the game for 40$ back then. Bought every battlepass in Overwatch 2 (in hope to support developing the game) and they not only cancel PvE but they still want you to pay 15$ for 3 PvE missions.

They knew before they released Overwatch 2 that they wouldn't deliver the PvE promise, but said nothing for half a year about it, so they wouldn't lose money and players.

Only game I played that doesn't give you premium currency for completing the whole battle pass, so you can't buy the battlepass again.

No big updates for Overwatch 1 for 3-4 years just so you would get 3 new heroes, 1 new gamemode and 6 new maps when Overwatch 2 released.

-Matchmaking gets worse and worse with every update they make. 
-One guy can have all top 10 spots on the Top 500 Leaderboard.
-They ban you for no good reason, because the bans are given automatically if you get enough reports.
-Sometimes you don't receive your Competitive rewards after a Season ends.
-No lootboxes.
-No way to get a good skin unless you pay for it.
-No good rewards from Events (in Overwatch 1 you could easily get multiplle Legendary skins if u grinded enough)
-No premium currency in the battlepass
-Sometimes when you play a match the server just shuts down and you get nothing for playing that match.
-Someone leaves a match and the game can't find a player to fill so you end up playing 4v5.
-Only 3 avoid spots.
-You wait longer to play a quickplay match than you do wait for a Ranked game.
-Every new support feels like a dps character.
-PvE is just like Overwatch 1 PvE with a face lift.

Blizzard are a bunch of greedy liers.

Blizzard promised the stars but barely reached the treetops. This is truly a sad attempt at reviving this game. With the influx of DLCs in their Steam release, it seems they're more focused on a quick profit than genuine game improvement. It's no surprise that they're swimming in a sea of criticism.

Still, if this is your cup of tea, consider giving it a try â€” especially since it's free. But be wary: steer clear of shelling out money for overpriced skins and their underwhelming PvE offerings.
